title: Contemporary Studio Retreat with Balcony in Green Pila Suburb
description: Step into a modern studio designed for efficiency and comfort, uniquely balancing open living with privacy in a flowing 29 sqm layout. Enjoy a bright living zone connected to a private balcony overlooking landscaped grounds—perfect for the morning coffee routine or evening unwinding. Key comforts such as underfloor heating and dedicated storage guarantee both convenience and warmth. The stylish bathroom completes a home ideal for practical, dynamic lifestyles.
neighborhood_description: Located in Pila’s Suburb area, this property sits amid leafy scenery in a calm, safe enclave. Wide open green spaces shape the tranquility of daily life, while easy highway access ensures swift connection to town and beyond. With peaceful surroundings and abundant walking routes, it’s a favored spot for students and young professionals alike.
lifestyle_benefits: quick highway commute to city campuses
target_buyer: Ideal for students or young professionals seeking peaceful, flexible living beneath the city’s pace—with direct routes to campus or office by car.
market_positioning: A competitively-priced studio offering modern fixtures in a calm, green suburb—rare at this price point, especially with contemporary amenities and pet-permissive rules.
